lv.edi.EDI_3DAtA.bloodvesselsegm

Class GaussianPyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.edi.EDI_3DAtA.bloodvesselsegm.GaussianPyramid

  • public class GaussianPyramid
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing Gaussian pyramid of image. Each layer of pyramid is two times smaller.
    Author:
    Ricards Cacurs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GaussianPyramid(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F src, int numberOfLayers, int kernelWidth, float kernelSigmaSQ)
      Constructor that creates Gaussian pyramid with specified parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GaussianPyramid

        public GaussianPyramid(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F src,
                       int numberOfLayers,
                       int kernelWidth,
                       float kernelSigmaSQ)
        Constructor that creates Gaussian pyramid with specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        src - input image, gaussian pyramid layer 0 specified in DenseMatrix64F
        numberOfLayers - number of layers for pyramid
        kernelWidth - size for the Gaussian filter kernel in pixels
        kernelSigmaSQ - sigma parameter for Gaussian filter (STD)

    • Method Detail

      • getLayer

        public org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F getLayer(int layer)
        Function for accessing pyramid layer
        Parameters:
        layer - layer index
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix64F returns specific layer. Returns null if index larger that number of pyramid layers

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns number of layers in Gaussian pyramid
        Returns:
        int Layer count in Gaussian pyramid
